Name: Dream Catcher
AddToolTip2: Summons a dream catcher at the cursor's location
Staying within the dream catcher will completely heal you if you take fatal damage
Only one dream catcher can exist at once

Name: Dream Weaver's Helmet
SetBonus:
Pressing the 'Special Ability' key will spend 200 mana and bend the very fabric of reality
Enemies will be heavily slowed and take 15% more damage from all sources
Allies will receive greatly increased movement and attack speed

Name: Dream Weaver's Hood
SetBonus:
Pressing the 'Special Ability' key will spend 200 mana and place you within the Dream
While in the Dream, healed allies will become briefly invulnerable and be cured of all debuffs
AddToolTip2: Healing spells will heal an additional 3 life

Name: Dream Weaver's Tabard
AddToolTip2: Healing spells will heal an additional 1 life

Name: Dream Weaver's Treads
AddToolTip2: Healing spells will heal an additional 1 life

Name: Lucidity
AddToolTip2: Releases a crescent tear in reality

Name: Reality Slasher
AddToolTip2: Rapidly spins a reality slicing scythe all around you
Nearby enemies are rapidly torn from reality

Name: Unbound Fantasy
AddToolTip2: Heals ally life by 5% of their maximum life per empower level
Channels a growing globule of unexplainable energy
While channelling, the orb will empower itself every 2 seconds
The orb can empower itself a maximum of three times
